title: Ranked Champion Select Error
body:
Hello i was about to play a ranked game and when i was in champion select i had multiple issues.
A. my team chat messages were not loading.
B. I only had 6 champions to choose from
I had also received an error message stating the problem so when i went to dodge i was banned for 30 minutes. Why are there issues with ranked queue still and may i be unbanned?

-Declah

replies.body:
Hey Declah,

I read your message, and I am really sorry to hear that you experienced this issue!  Given that it has been a few days, I wanted to check in to see if you are still experiencing these types of issues!  If so, please do not hesitate to respond back to me!
hey i have had a chat problem too and so has my boyfriend
